All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AllureDbClientManager
Specialized DbClientManager implementation for Allure reporting.
DatabaseServiceFluent
Provides a fluent API for database interactions.
DB
Marks a test class as a database-related test.
DbHook
Defines a database hook to run before or after all tests in a class.
DbHookExtension
JUnit 5 extension that processes DbHook annotations on the test class.
DbHookFlow<T extends Enum<T>>
Defines a single database hook implementation to run custom logic before or after all tests in a class
DbHooks
Container annotation that allows multiple DbHook annotations to be applied to a test class
DbTestExtension
JUnit 5 extension for managing database connections in tests.
DbTestFrameworkAutoConfiguration
Configures the database test framework components.
QueryResponseValidatorAllureImpl
Enhances QueryResponseValidatorImpl with Allure reporting.
RelationalDbClientAllure
Enhances RelationalDbClient with Allure reporting.
RetryConditionDb
Provides retry conditions for database queries.
StorageKeysDb
Defines storage keys for database-related data.
